text: Lulism is a political ideology that supports social movements and the Workers' Party led by President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva. Lulism supports reforms about poverty in Brazil. While supporting socialism, Lulism is more of a social democratic movement that wants to close the gaps between the rich and the poor in a market way. ==References== Category:Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva
title: Lulism
